51c1edab440268cdb0754ff0c4584a9f (12:51): 0fe3e42599c56fbaca03eb8741198d35: when you get asked what configure options you use, _every_ one is important
0fe3e42599c56fbaca03eb8741198d35 (12:51): I didn't think --disable-updater would be uncommon
51c1edab440268cdb0754ff0c4584a9f (12:52): (I learned that the hard way over the years)
0fe3e42599c56fbaca03eb8741198d35 (12:52): ah, but you asked 'any odd mozconfig entries' :P

81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (12:57): 8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81: --disable-optimize is pretty common
8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81 (12:58): Could explain why we're so slow!
8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81 (12:59): And stop complaining about my nonsensical generalizations
8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81 (12:59): Oh, and I needed you yesterday
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (12:59): well, see, there's this little thing called the weekend
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (12:59): and sometimes I do things besides work on them
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (13:00): wonders if now is a bad time to mention that he's going to be on PTO for a good part of the next two weeks
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (13:00): anyways, what did you need?
8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81 (13:00): How much would you hate me if I had a C program run as part of the build? :)
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (13:01): a fair amount
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (13:01): what program?
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (13:03): I'm kinda regretting that I decided to make the parser class hierarchy more reasonable instead of just piling on more stuff into the existing classes
8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81 (13:03): Because I'm not a fan of having generated files in the tree
51c1edab440268cdb0754ff0c4584a9f (13:03): 81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b: not before I get my review on the 800,000 KB patch I'm about to stuff into your review queue
51c1edab440268cdb0754ff0c4584a9f (13:04): switches us to automake tree wide, and expects 81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b to r+ it today
8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81 (13:04): b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9, but we do much appreciate it
51c1edab440268cdb0754ff0c4584a9f (13:04): and then forget to land it, cause I hate automake
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (13:05): 51c1edab440268cdb0754ff0c4584a9f: r- is insufficient

a860589a1e5737c078a9dcd0e12edc4e (13:05): Is there a way I can send a message from my program to Thunderbird? My end goal is to tell it to make a new message with HTML inside. Mailto html-body does not work for me.
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (13:05): 51c1edab440268cdb0754ff0c4584a9f: I will change my flight, come to boston, find where you live, and personally murder you in the most brutal fashion
51c1edab440268cdb0754ff0c4584a9f (13:05): 81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b: so long as you bring cookies, no problem
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (13:05): 8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81: that's not a good enough reason
